level.heading: Effects clause.
level.text: Any practice which has the effect or consequence of violating any of the provisions of this chapter shall be deemed to be an unlawful discriminatory practice.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Dec. 13, 1977, D.C. Law 2-38, title II, ยง 268, 24 DCR 6038.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-38
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-38, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 2-1401.01.
